:::::: {#about-content}
### Hi, I'm Lennart! <span aria-hidden="true">&#x1F44B;&#x1F642;</span>

<div style="text-align: justify">
I'm a doctoral student and research associate in the [Econometrics Group](https://www.uni-bielefeld.de/fakultaeten/wirtschaftswissenschaften/lehrbereiche/econometrics/) at Bielefeld University. I like data science and math, [teaching both](https://blogs.uni-bielefeld.de/blog/wiwi/entry/andreas_handl_lehrpreis_2024_anerkennung), and developing open source software. In my spare time, you can find me in front of a chess board or [above the clouds](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2vc8qY3B5c).
</div>

::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
## Research Interests

-   [Discrete choice models](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discrete_choice), in particular preference heterogeneity and Bayesian estimation of latent class mixed multinomial probit models.
-   [Numerical optimization](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mathematical_optimization), in particular methods for efficient and robust initialization.
-   [Hidden Markov models](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hidden_Markov_model), in particular hierarchical extensions to improve trend detection in financial time series across different time scales.
:::

::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}

- [Bayesian probit models for preference classification](files/IWSM2023-oelschlaeger-bauer-poster.pdf), IWSM in Dortmund, 18.07.2023
